Arduino Car

About this project

As part of my NUS coursework, my group designed and built an autonomous vehicle that has the ability to follow a black line marked on a white background by making use of the different reflectivity of dark and light surfaces.

We soldered Light Dependent Resistors (LDRs) to the car, which were used to dictate which wheels should be operating and at what speed, based on LEDs soldered to the car.

  • Integrated Arduino Uno, LDRs, LEDs, PCBs and Gearbox
  • Programmed using Arduino IDE
